wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[13 January|13]]''' - Actor [[Orlando Bloom]] is born. 
* '''[[17 January|17]]''' - [[Adam Fox]], [[Inklings|Inkling]], dies.

==February==
* '''[[14 February|14]]''' - ''[[The Mythology of Middle-earth]]'', [[Ruth S. Noel]]'s first book on Tolkien's works, is published.

==April==
* '''[[1 April|1]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children found [[The Tolkien Trust]] charity.

==May==
* '''[[5 May|5]] - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography]]'' is first published in the UK.'''
* '''[[16 May|16]]''' - Singer [[Emiliana Torrini]] is born.

==June==
* '''[[11 June|11]]''' - The first [[Wisconsin Ring Game]] is held at [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Governor_Dodge_State_Park Governor Dodge State Park] in southern Wisconsin.
* '''[[29 June|29]]''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography]]'' is published in the US.

==July==
* '''[[1 July|1]]''' - Actress [[Liv Tyler]] is born.

==August==
* '''[[26 August|26]]-[[29 August|29]]''' - [[Mythcon 8]].

==September==
* '''[[1 September|1]]''' - ''[[Cliffs Notes on Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[15 September|15]]''' - '''[[The Silmarillion]] is published by [[Christopher Tolkien]]'''.
* '''[[23 September|23]]-[[25 September|25]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1977]].

==November==
* '''[[1 November|1]]''' - [[Ted Johnstone]] dies.
* '''[[27 November|27]]''' - [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1977 film)]] is released on VHS in the United States.

==December==
* '''[[18 December|18]]''' - Actor [[Cyril Ritchard]] dies.
==?==

* '''?''' - The [[American Hobbit Association]] is founded.
* '''?''' - Artist [[Anke Eißmann]] is born.
* '''?''' - Actor [[Daniel Weyman]] is born.
* '''?''' - ''[[Middle Earth: The World of Tolkien Illustrated]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[The Silmarillion by J.R.R. Tolkien: A Brief Account of the Book and its Making]]'', a pamphlet by [[Christopher Tolkien]], is published.
* '''?''' - [[The Calendar of Numenor for 1978]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[The Hobbit Desk Calendar 1978]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[The Silmarillion Calendar 1978]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[1978 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[Middle-earth Enterprises|Tolkien Enterprises]] is formed by [[Saul Zaentz]].
